page.description: Indiciates whether or not the layout has changed.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.SET_DIRTY() method indicates that the layout has changed and needs to be saved.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") frm.set_dirty()
